events.name: QuoteGenerated
events.description: This event signifies the successful generation of a sales quote.

events.name: QuoteApproved
events.description: This event indicates that a sales quote has been approved by the relevant parties.

events.name: QuoteRejected
events.description: This event signifies that a sales quote has been rejected and requires revision.

events.name: QuoteExpired
events.description: This event is triggered when a sales quote is no longer valid due to time limits.

events.name: QuoteSentToCustomer
events.description: This event indicates that a sales quote has been sent to the customer for review.

commands.name: GenerateQuote
commands.description: This event signifies the successful generation of a sales quote.

commands.name: ApproveQuote
commands.description: This event indicates that a sales quote has been approved by the relevant parties.

commands.name: RejectQuote
commands.description: This event signifies that a sales quote has been rejected and requires revision.

commands.name: ExpireQuote
commands.description: This event is triggered when a sales quote is no longer valid due to time limits.

commands.name: SendQuote
commands.description: This event indicates that a sales quote has been sent to the customer for review.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrating with the Customer Management system allows for better cross-referencing customer data with sales quotes.

integrationPoints.name: ProductCatalog
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Product Catalog ensures that the latest product information is available when generating quotes.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Connecting to the Order Management system will streamline the transition from quotes to orders.
